cache.xcsrf_desc: XCSRF tokens should last a couple minutes without problem, there's no reason to change this value.
cache.verify_desc: Verification tokens should last a couple minutes without issue.
cache.roles_desc: This should be fine unless your group changes its ranks often.
cache.rolesetid_desc: This will be fine if you don't change your exile bot's rank often.
cache.product_desc: Disabled by default for security (price checks). If you are only working with ROBLOX assets, however, you can set this to something high (since ROBLOX product info rarely changes).
cache.namefromid_desc: Caches a user's username based on their ID. It is not on by default because it is an uncontrollable change but the option is there to cache it if you would like.
cache.idfromname_desc: Permanent cache for a user's ID based on their name. There is no reason this would ever change (changing names would re-match it and old names cannot be reused by other accounts).
cache.rank_desc: Caches rank by user ID. Changes cannot be anticipated so this is not enabled by default.
